column5: Fully updated apartment. 1 bedroom. Queen size bed. About 3 miles to cowboys stadium, Nature park and trail behind community. Vault ceiling. 3rd flr. Full use of kitchen and priv. bath. Keyless locks. Cable with all channels in bedroom and very fast WiFi. Small cappuccino maker in kitchen. Very private balcony. 1k sq ft apartment with reading den. You get the master bedroom and bath. We'll be on couches or at a friend's tbd at time of booking. 3 couches to sleep extra guests.
column8: Close to cowboys stadium large updated apartment.
